text: {{Infobox settlement |official_name = Carmichael |settlement_type = Census designated place |image_skyline = |imagesize = |image_caption = |image_map = Sacramento_County_California_Incorporated_and_Unincorporated_areas_Carmichael_Highlighted.svg |map_caption = |subdivision_type = Country |subdivision_name = United States |subdivision_type1 = State |subdivision_name1 = California |subdivision_type2 = County |subdivision_name2 = Sacramento | unit_pref = Imperial | area_footnotes = | area_total_sq_mi = 15.57 | area_land_sq_mi = 15.33 | area_water_sq_mi = 0.23 | area_total_km2 = 40.32 | area_land_km2 = 39.71 | area_water_km2 = 0.60 | area_water_percent = 1.92 |elevation_footnotes = |elevation_ft = 125 |population_metro = |population_as_of = 2020 |population_total = 79793 |population_footnotes = |population_density_sq_mi = 5203.67 |population_density_km2 = 2009.17 |timezone = Pacific |utc_offset = -8 |timezone_DST = PDT |utc_offset_DST = -7 |coordinates = |postal_code_type = ZIP codes |postal_code = 95608 |area_code_type = Area code |area_code = 916, 279 |blank_name = FIPS code |blank_info = |blank1_name = GNIS feature ID |blank1_info = }} Carmichael is a census-designated place (CDP) in Sacramento County, California, United States. It is a suburb in the Greater Sacramento metropolitan area. The population was 79,793 at the 2020 census. ==References== Category:Census-designated places in California Category:Settlements in Sacramento County, California
title: Carmichael, California
